amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws that are necessary to protect children from exploitation in the work place.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendments numbered 28 and 29 as printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that the bill would not apply to laws and regulation regarding protection of children from exploitation in the work place.

action.text: On agreeing to the Becerra amendments (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 269 (Roll no. 67).
